attributes.title: Oh to see without my eyes 👁👄👁
attributes.review:
This app cost my whole family to just get snapped out of the universe😱 the moment I opened it I got haunted by the Debbie Ryan and Mike Wazowski pick. This creature would follow me everywhere I went and I mean Everywhere🤮
This app also made me to dance uncontrollably until I died just like the dancing plague.

attributes.title: Shameful
attributes.review: Had to delete the app after all the signs of pedophilia I witnessed. Hurt my eyes and my heart. And what’s up with the little orange piglet plastered everywhere?

attributes.title: GET RID OF IT!
attributes.review: This app is the worst one it has to much power and next I can’t stand all of the clutter to some it’s fine but,for people like me we can never stand something like this.we need this app to end, its the worst!

attributes.title: 👁👄👁 NO❤️
attributes.review: I open this app and I saw a orange Cheeto man 🦁blubbering about random stuff and I thought I heard my dog 🐶say something but it was just my cat🐱 levitating on the ceiling saying 💅🏻✨🧚🏻‍♂️TRUMP 2020 BUT ON A GRAVESTONE 💅🏻✨🧚🏻‍♂️and I thought about how loyal of a cat she is.PERIDOT.💫✨❤️

attributes.title: This app hacked my phone
attributes.review: Ew. My phone got hacked and started showing me pictures of a big fat Cheeto looking man standing naked.it was disgusting. This app is so inappropriate. The app also started saying loads of inappropriate things like cuss words and sexual topics. The big fat Cheeto looking man started asking for nudes. I didn’t know they had installed a camera to look at me whenever I wasn’t using the app. I had to get something to cover the camera and find a way to get rid of the Cheeto man. I had to pay over $8000 to pay for a new phone, get rid of the virus, and get the app of my phone this app is so horrible. The Cheeto man is sooooooooooo ugly and fat omg

attributes.title: Absolute disgrace🧚🏼‍♀️
attributes.review: The first thing I saw when I opened this app was, you guessed it, my grandma wearing a swimsuit with a picture of Trump eating my dog. Yes, my very own dog.😢 The government tracked my location through the app and came and stole my dog for him to eat🤮🤮 The only thing they left me to remember my dearest Hebert by was the very tip of his tail because Donald refused to eat it. I guess he does it for some kind of creepy ritual to. Are his hair grow or something??? 10473743842939103147/10 DO NOT RECOMMEND.  Be careful or they’ll get your dogs too😭😭😭

attributes.title: Have you ever used garbage as a news provider?
attributes.review: Or maybe even a piece of poop? That would be about 100x better than using this app. I rather listen to nails on a chalkboard board for ten hours than to use this trash app.

attributes.title: Badddd
attributes.review: Grrrrr me no like app very bad 👿

attributes.title: I’m poor now
attributes.review:
I downloaded this app and it hijacked ALL my apps... like ALLL of them.
Facebook, Twitter, Insta, YouTube, email, even my CAMERA ROLL! My camera roll is filled with pictures of an orange guy! since it hijacked everything, my BAnk was even messed with and I have no money now. And I couldn’t pay my bills, so I was kicked out. Now I live on the streets. I’m literally writing this review on a flip phone since I’m so broke now.
My life is ruined.
TERRIBLE TERRIBLE APP!😡😡😡😡
